website_summaries.verdict: These wheels will give your golf cart a great look and allow you to handle tough terrain.
pros: Comes as a set of four wheels and tires
Tires have all-terrain tread to give them the same durability as the tires on your car
Work well on grass, gravel, and dirt
cons: Taller than others on the market
You might need a lift kit on your cart to use them

customer_reviews.title: Lug nuts not included. Factory lug nuts wont work
customer_reviews.text: Rims look great exactly what I wanted, only issue is I just bought a lift kit and these rims/tires and spent the last 2 days installing the lift kit to find out the factory lug nuts will not fit or work with the new rims.so now I have a inoperable golf cart with sitting on jacks waiting for me to find a solution because my purchase was not completely fulfilled with the lug nuts claiming to be provided with purchase of rims and tires... I would love for the seller to send me my already paid for lug nuts so my golf cart can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description of the item is not what you get
customer_reviews.text: So in the title it says "new 5spoke style”and the picture shows a 5 spoke rim as well I ordered these to match my wife's cart and because she has the 5 spoke rims I had the 10x22s 6 spoke rims and I ordered these and they are the 6 spoke rims definitely not what it says
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN H.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived several days earlier than expected. The tires came mounted and everything was ready to go. The boxes appeared a bit beat up, so I inspected the wheels immediately upon opening up the box, and they were perfect. Very high quality, and they make a huge difference. Installed on Yamaha Drive
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires looks so good on our ezgo golf cart. The shipping was so fast and I love them. Thank you so much for the fast service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: dodgebaby

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity at its best!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Hassle free. Simply unbox, instal, and ride. I highly recommend!!! I put these on my '05 Club Car Precedent with a MadJax 6" lift. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: The wheels and tires look awesome. I would give the product and they're service more than 5 stars if I could. They arrived sooner than promised with standard lug nuts. I sent 1 email explaining my cart was a Yamaha and needed metric lugs. They were sent out the next morning! They far exceeded my expectations. I will definetly purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of Wheels and tires!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier!! Look and ride better than expected, came quick and ready to install!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Golf cart king always delivers quality items with super fast shipping. I have bought several items from them and have never been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the look and size of the tire as well as a great looking rim
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look fantastic. Run out very smooth. Had a few bad lug nuts but other than that great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wheels
customer_reviews.text: Wheels look even better in person. 100% satisfied with my selection.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: order these they are awesome you will not be sorry, they look amazing on my lifted cart
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they said they are we are happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: very nice with the 6" lift kit installed
customer_reviews.text: They changed the entire appearance of my wife golf cart with the 6" lift kit.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic look and ride. I installed these on a new Club Car Precedent with 6” lift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 14" VAMPIRE Machined/Black Aluminum Wheels and 23x10-14" DOT All Terrain Golf Cart Tires Combo - Set of 4 (New Style 5-Spoke Vampire!)
product_meta.description:
Welcome to a new style of luxury! Now our Aggressive and high-end 14" Machined Black VAMPIRE golf cart wheels now come in a 5-Spoke model, as requested by many! We wrap these beauties in our 23"x10-14 DOT All Terrain Golf Cart Tires to create the ultimate 14" Wheel and Tire combo that will allow you to adventure with no limits! These wheels are extremely tough, and are only done true justice when seen in person.

Our 14" Machined Black VAMPIRE combo includes:
- (4) Fresh 23x10-14" DOT Approved All Terrain Golf Cart tires
- (4) Brand new 14"x7" Machined & Black VAMPIRE Aluminum wheels
- (4) Center Caps (Chrome)
- (4) Sets of Lug Nuts (chrome)

TECH SPECS: 
Tire size: 23x10-14
DOT Rated: YES 
Tire height (ground to top of tire): 23 inches
Ply Rating: 4 ply 
Wheel Offset: 3+4 (3" back, 4" front)
Bolt Pattern: 4x4 (101.6mm) 

FITMENT GUIDE:
Does my Cart require a lift kit?? 
EZGO: Marathon / Medalist / TXT /ST / PDS / RXV / Workhorse - YES (5" or higher) 
CLUB CAR: DS / CARRYALL / PRECEDENT - YES (6" or higher) 
YAMAHA: All G MODELS (except G29) - YES (6" or higher) 
YAMAHA: DRIVE(G29) - YES (5" or higher)
feature_bullets: Includes: (4) 14"x7" VAMPIRE Machined Black Golf Cart Wheels (5-Spoke new style!), (4) 23x10-14 DOT Approved All Terrain Golf Cart Tires, (4) Chrome Center Caps, (4) Sets of Chrome Lug Nuts
A lift kit is required for all Club Car, EZGO, and Yamaha Golf Carts
Stands 23" Tall (from ground to the top of tire)
DOT All Terrain tire tread great for both ON & OFF road use
Come mounted and aired up to the proper pressure and fits any hub that is 4 bolt and measures 4x4" (4x101.6mm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
